Didier-Jorda.name: Didier Jorda
description: @+Sir Didier Jorda+@ is the Grand Master of the Knights of the Righteous Soul, the clandestine order of mage hunters dedicated to keeping the Realm of Tovanis safe from the unchecked scourge of arcane magic.

Ignac-Lazar.name: Ignac Lazar
description: @+Ignac Lazar+@ is the Provost Vicarium of the Realm of Tovanis, and thus holder of its second-most senior office.. The Provost Vicarium is appointed directly by the Provost Supremina of Tovanis under the advice of the Atrium Fidelium.

Szofi-Diana.name: Szofi Diana
description: @+Lady Szofi Diana+@ is the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Realm of Tovanis.

Mozes-Kovacs.name: Mozes Kovacs
description: @+Mozes Kovacs+@ is the Lord Marshal and a former Provost Vicarium of the Realm of Tovanis. He is a decorated field commander and an accomplished fencer.

Cornelia-Katalin.name: Cornelia Katalin
description: @+Cornelia Katalin+@ is the Sister Superior of the Oracula Anethos Solum.
